Agents Multi-Agent Orchestration
Arena Discussion Agents Variations Confessions
Agents Mode: Route tasks to the best tool

A Qwen 2.5-7B orchestrator plans the conversation, decides which specialist tool to call, and keeps going for multiple rounds until it can return a confident answer.

  • Available tools: reasoning models, final answer generation, DuckDuckGo search, and Python code interpreter.
  • Control temperature, max tokens, and round budget for each run.
  • Stream tool calls/results as they happen for full transparency.
Try an example:
Multi-Agent Orchestration System
Specialist agents (Qwen, Phi, Llama) collaborate with tools to solve complex tasks
using Microsoft's AutoGen framework for intelligent multi-agent coordination.
Available Tools
  • enhance_reasoning Route to specialized reasoning models
  • answer Generate final answers using best-fit model
  • search Web search via DuckDuckGo API
  • code_interpreter Execute Python code in sandboxed environment
Powered by Microsoft AutoGen framework
